title: Software Engineer (Java/AWS/DevOps)
description:
**This is Worldline** 




  





 Worldline helps businesses of all shapes and sizes to accelerate their growth journey - quickly, simply, and securely. We are the innovators at the heart of the payments technology industry, shaping how the world pays and gets paid. Our technology powers the growth of millions of businesses across 5 continents. And just as we help our customers accelerate their business, we are committed to helping our people accelerate their careers. Together, we shape the evolution.
 



  





  





**The Opportunity** 




  





 At Worldline, delivering a fantastic payment experience that our customers love is what drives us forward. Our cloud-native acquiring platform is processing billions of card transactions including authorization processing and clearing & settlement for our customers to trust. Currently, we are looking for a skilled product-oriented DevOps Software Engineer to team up with one of our product-oriented DevOps teams.
 



  





  





**Day-to-Day Responsibilities** 




  





 Our autonomous teams work with a lean product focused DevOps culture that continuously delivers true outcome, and if you build it, you run it! This means that you are responsible for:
 



  




* Active participation and contribution in all phases of the product lifecycle including discovery, delivery and operations
* Delivering your team’s committed objectives, adapting to whatever is needed to reach the goal you and your team have committed yourselves to reach
* Securing an outstanding qualitative service availability 24/7/365 and on-call duty is expected according to a rotating schedule



  





 You love identifying the outcomes to be achieved together with your team, our customers, our internal users, other stakeholders and suppliers to deliver a truly outstanding acquiring processing experience for our customer and our business to love.
 



  





  





**What makes you stand out** 




  




* You are a junior to mid-experienced Software Engineer used to full-cycle DevOps mode
* You have been developing in Java/AWS for some time exposed to micro-services and serverless technologies
* Have highly collaborative attitude, setting your team first while also successfully collaborating with others
* You are comfortable in a fast-moving and agile culture - handling many different stakeholders, prioritizations and fast decisions is not an issue for you
* If you have previous experience from the card-payment industry, preferably acquiring processing or other transaction intense industry where scale is important that’s a big advantage
* Being passionate about delivering a payment acquiring experience that brings value for our customers and our business
* Acting as a role model for your team and others by paying attention to commitment, accountability and the true outcome for yourself, your team, our customers and internal users



  





  





**Who Are We Looking For** 




  





 People who can drive positive change, step up and show what’s next – people with passion, can-do attitude and a hunger to learn and grow. You also have:
 



  




* Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, engineering or other meaningful field Have confirmed experience in software development including Java, Python and SQL etc.
* Experience from high-available micro-services and serverless architecture and design leveraging on the AWS cloud for scalability and resilience.
* As a result, we would like you also to have some experience in/interest for
* AWS cloud services including DynamoDB, Lambdas, S3 etc.
* Infrastructure as code using Terraform and CloudFormation
* Continuous delivery pipelines using Jenkins and GIT
* Docker
* Knowledge secure coding
* A deep understanding of software quality assurance principles
* Fluency in English (Swedish is an advantage)
* Valid working permit for Sweden (office location is Stockholm)



  





  





**Skills we’d like** 




  




* Experience from DevOps ways of working and lean culture
* Paying attention to commitment, accountability and result for yourself and for your team.
* Experience from developing secure and/or PCI-DSS certified solutions is considered an advantage
* Good communication and presentation abilities
* Challenging status quo
* Having a technical and curious mindset, continuously learning and sharing your knowledge with your peers and others.



  





  





**Perks & Benefits** 




  





 At Worldline, you’ll get the chance to be at the heart of the global payments technology industry and shape how the world pays and gets paid. On top of that, you will also:
 


* Health contribution
* Health check – Every 2: nd year
* Pension: BTP1 & BTP2
* Private Health Care Insurance (Euro Accident)
* Parental pay and 12 months pension during parental leave
* Opportunity to hybrid working according to company standard
* Benefit portal with many great offers, plus more.



  





  





**Shape the evolution** 




  





 We are pushing towards the next frontiers of payments technology, and we are looking for big thinkers to join our journey. People with passion, can-do attitude and a hunger to learn and grow. Here you’ll work with ambitious colleagues from around the world, take on unique challenges as a team, and make a real impact on society. And with our empowering culture, strong technology and extensive training opportunities, we help you accelerate your career. Wherever you decide to go. Join our global team of over 18,000 innovators across 40+ countries and shape a tomorrow that is yours to own.
 



  





 Learn more about life at Worldline at jobs.worldline.com
 



  





 We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as an individual with a disability, or any applicable legally protected characteristics.

title: C++ Developer
description:
**Company Description**
 Technology is our how. And people are our why. For over two decades, we have been harnessing technology to drive meaningful change.
   

  

 By combining world-class engineering, industry expertise and a people-centric mindset, we consult and partner with leading brands from various industries to create dynamic platforms and intelligent digital experiences that drive innovation and transform businesses.
   

  

 From prototype to real-world impact - be part of a global shift by doing work that matters.
   

  

**Job Description**
 We are seeking a talented C++ Developer to join our dynamic team in Stockholm, Sweden. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining high-performance C++ applications while implementing DevOps practices to streamline our development and deployment processes.
   

  

* Design, develop, and maintain C++ telecom solutions with a focus on performance and scalability
* Containerize applications using Docker and orchestrate them with Kubernetes
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to improve software development lifecycle
* Optimize and troubleshoot application performance issues
* Implement and maintain monitoring and logging solutions for applications and infrastructure
* Contribute to the design and implementation of microservices architecture
* Automate infrastructure provisioning and configuration management
* Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members
* Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in C++ development and DevOps
* Three days work from office or client location.


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field
* 2-3 years experience in C++ development, with a strong understanding of modern C++ standards and telecom.
* Proficiency in version control systems, particularly Git
* Experience with CI/CD tools such as Jenkins, GitLab CI, or CircleCI
* Strong knowledge of Linux/Unix systems and shell scripting
* Familiarity with scripting languages like Python or Bash
* Experience with containerization technologies, especially Docker and Kubernetes
* Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP) and their services
* Familiarity with monitoring and logging tools such as Prometheus and ELK stack
* Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
* Excellent communication and collaboration abilities
* Experience with microservices architecture and distributed systems
* Knowledge of performance optimization techniques and troubleshooting methodologies
* Can speak and write fluently in English


 Additional Information
   

  

 Discover some of the global benefits that empower our people to become the best version of themselves:
   

  

  

* Finance:
   

 Competitive salary package, value-based recognition awards, referral bonus;
* Career Development:
   

 Career coaching, global career opportunities, non-linear career paths, internal development programmes for management and technical leadership;
* Learning Opportunities:
   

 Complex projects, rotations, internal tech communities, training, certifications, coaching, online learning platforms subscriptions, pass-it-on sessions, workshops, conferences;
* Work-Life Balance:
   

 Hybrid work and flexible working hours, employee assistance programme;
* Health:
   

 Global internal wellbeing programme, access to wellbeing apps;
* Community:
   

 Global internal tech communities, hobby clubs and interest groups, inclusion and diversity programmes, events and celebrations.


 At Endava, we’re committed to creating an open, inclusive, and respectful environment where everyone feels safe, valued, and empowered to be their best. We welcome applications from people of all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives—because we know that inclusive teams help us deliver smarter, more innovative solutions for our customers. Hiring decisions are based on merit, skills, qualifications, and potential. If you need adjustments or support during the recruitment process, please let us know.

title: Java Developer
description:
*Are you a seasoned Java developer who values stability over startup chaos? Join our Broadband Provisioning team at Tele2, where we keep Sweden connected — not through cables and routers, but by making sure every broadband order flows smoothly from start to finish. You’ll work in a pragmatic environment that values reliability, simplicity, and long-term impact over buzzwords and hype.*
**About The Job**
 We’re looking for a Java developer to help maintain and evolve our broadband provisioning systems — the backbone that ensures customers get the right service at the right time. You’ll work with a small, experienced team focused on improving and stabilizing our order management and fulfillment flows.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop and maintain Java-based backend systems for broadband order handling.
* Work closely with operations and product teams to ensure smooth provisioning processes.
* Improve existing systems through refactoring, testing, and documentation.
* Contribute to modernization efforts over time, balancing pragmatism with technical improvement.


**Who are you?**
 To thrive in this role, we believe you:
   

  

* Have solid experience in Java development (preferably 5+ years).
* Understand backend architecture and integration patterns (REST, messaging, etc.).
* Are comfortable working with legacy systems and gradual improvements.
* Communicate clearly and take responsibility for stable, maintainable code.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience with Spring Boot, Maven, or similar frameworks.
* Familiarity with telecom or provisioning systems.
* Exposure to CI/CD pipelines and basic cloud infrastructure.


**Personal qualities**
 You’re grounded, reliable, and pragmatic — someone who takes pride in keeping things running. You value teamwork, continuity, and incremental progress over flashy rewrites.

title: Java Developer
description: Java programming language. Extensive experience with the Spring framework and Spring Boot for building web applications. Solid understanding of object-oriented programming (OOP) principles and design patterns. Experience with database technologies (e.g., SQL, NoSQL) and ORM frameworks (e.g., Hibernate, JPA).Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git).Designing, developing, and maintaining high-performance, scalable applications using Java and Spring Boot. Implementing and consuming RESTful APIs and microservices. Collaborating with front-end developers, QA testers, and other stakeholders to deliver integrated solutions. Ensuring code quality through unit testing, integration testing, and code reviews. Troubleshooting, debugging, and resolving technical issues. Participating in the full software development lifecycle, from requirements gathering to deployment. Strong proficiency in Java programming language. Extensive experience with the Spring framework and Spring Boot for building web applications. Solid understanding of object-oriented programming (OOP) principles and design patterns. Experience with database technologies (e.g., SQL, NoSQL) and ORM frameworks (e.g., Hibernate, JPA).Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git).Knowledge of cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) is often a plus. Experience with build tools like Maven or Gradle. Understanding of agile development methodologies. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills. Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.

title: System developer, Örebro
description:
**About Justera Group**
 Justera Group AB is a leading Swedish IT consulting firm with great experience specializing in building high-performing technology teams and delivering end-to-end IT solutions. Led by dynamic female executives, Justera Group focuses on helping businesses harness the power of digital technologies to continuously evolve in today’s rapidly changing economy. The company has deep expertise in IT consultancy, software development, and recruitment services, providing clients with purpose-driven, well-trained consultants who consistently deliver efficient and effective results. Justera Group manages the entire talent lifecycle, from hiring to ongoing management, ensuring the right fit for each project on time and within budget. With their strong commitment to quality, collaboration, and client success, Justera Group is a trusted partner for technology innovation across Sweden.
   

  

**About the Role:**
 You will be part of an agile delivery team in the role of system developer, which currently consists of Scrum master, system developer, tester, requirements analyst and product owner responsible for the backlog. The work includes both management of existing IT solutions and new development. The assignment may also include tasks in other areas within our IT department. You must work during regular working hours, which are between 06:30 and 18:30. It may be necessary to be on standby in connection with production starts. These occasions are planned if necessary together with the IT delivery manager and the delivery teams. Any standby must always be initiated and decided by the Swedish Transport Agency.
   

  

**Key Requirements:**
* at least four (4) years of documented work experience in system development within the .NET platform (.NET Framework and/or .NET Core/.NET 5+). The experience must be from assignments/projects carried out within the last six (6) years from the last tender date.
* at least four (4) years of documented experience in development in C#. The experience must be from assignments/projects carried out within the last six (6) years from the last tender date.
* at least three (3) years of documented experience working with Microsoft SQL Server, including development of stored procedures, data modeling and performance optimization. The experience must be from assignments/projects completed within the last five (5) years from the deadline for submission of bids.
* at least two (2) years of continuous experience working with both frontend and backend development in the same project or delivery team. Frontend can include frameworks such as React, Angular or similar. The experience must be from assignments/projects completed within the last six (6) years from the deadline for submission of bids.
* at least four (4) years of experience working in agile delivery teams, according to e.g. Scrum. The experience must include active participation in sprint planning, demo, retrospective and daily meetings.The experience must be from assignments/projects carried out within the last six (6) years from the last date of tender.
* have good ability to express oneself in Swedish, both orally and in writing


**Merit Requirements**
 The following criteria are not mandatory, but if met, provide added value in the Swedish Transport Agency's evaluation. The consultant should have:
   

  

* at least three (3) years of current experience\* of development in MVC or Blazor.
* at least two (2) years of current experience\* of RabbitMQ.
* at least two (2) years of current experience\* of nServiceBus.
* at least two (2) years of current experience\* of Microsoft SSIS packages.
* at least two (2) years of current experience\* of working with system development in agile teams within a government agency.
* at least two (2) years of current experience\* of working in projects or administration that handle security-sensitive information, e.g. personal or vehicle data.
* at least two (2) years of relevant experience\* in DevOps-related work, such as CI/CD, automated testing, and version control (e.g. Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions, Jenkins).


**What We Offer:**
* A dynamic and innovative workplace driving advancements in cutting-edge robotic technologies
* The opportunity to collaborate with talented cross-functional teams on meaningful and impactful projects
* Competitive compensation and comprehensive benefits package
* A supportive culture that fosters continuous learning, growth, and professional development
* Flexible hybrid working model for an optimal work-life balance
* 25 days of annual leave to recharge and relax
* An annual wellness allowance of 3,500 SEK to support your health and wellbeing

title:
Jobb
Engineering Manager – Developer Platform
description:
Engineering Manager – Developer Platform
   

  

**SJ AB**
 Stockholm
   

  

 Ansök senast: 2025-12-01
   

  

 Sök jobbet här
   

  

*Vi söker en Engineering Manager till vår Developer Platform som vill vara med och driva framtidens hållbara resor. Hos oss får du leda ett engagerat techteam och vara med och forma digitala lösningar som gör skillnad – för både resenärer och samhället. Du brinner för utvecklarproduktivitet och att göra det svåra enkelt och det enkla skalbart.*
**Din kommande roll** 
  

  

 Platform består idag av flera team med fokus på utvecklarplattform, molninfrastruktur och driftlösningar. Vi arbetar produktorienterat med att skapa self-service-tjänster som gör det enkelt för våra utvecklare att bygga, deploya och övervaka system – snabbt, enkelt, säkert och med hög kvalitet. Våra lösningar bygger på
 **Azure** 
 , Kubernetes, ArgoCD, Terraform, GitHub, Backstage och Grafana. Målet är att skapa en modern, driftsäker och effektiv plattform där utvecklare kan fokusera på innovation mer än på infrastruktur.
   

  

 Som Engineering Manager är du en central person för att vidareutveckla vår engineering kultur. Du ansvarar för att leda team med bred kompetens inom utveckling, moln och plattformar, som tillsammans utvecklar och förvaltar några av SJ:s mest centrala lösningar.
   

  

**Du Kommer Att**
* Leda, motivera och utveckla ett team som äger och vidareutvecklar SJ:s interna utvecklarplattform genom tydlig kommunikation och målstyrning.
* Säkerställa teamets leveransförmåga och att våra tekniska lösningar är robusta, framtidssäkra och verksamhetsnära.
* Utveckla och förfina våra lösningar inom developer productivity, automation, observability och self-service med Azure, Backstage, Grafana, ArgoCD och Terraform.
* Driva både teknisk strategi och produktledning för plattformen tillsammans med övriga ledare – du balanserar vision och leverans, långsiktighet och tempo.
* Bidra till arkitekturval, tekniska beslut och strategisk utveckling av vår gemensamma plattform.
* Arbeta aktivt med kontinuerliga förbättringar, säkerhet, kvalitet och hantering av teknisk skuld.


**Förväntningar på den vi söker**
 Vi söker dig som har en teknisk bakgrund och trivs i rollen som ledare. Du förstår vikten av pålitliga system i en samhällskritisk verksamhet och drivs av att skapa struktur och riktning i en tekniskt komplex miljö. Du är en teknisk ledare med bakgrund som utvecklare och vet hur bra plattformar och välfungerande team byggs. Du kombinerar djup teknisk förståelse med förmågan att skapa riktning, fokus och värde.
   

  

**Vi Ser Gärna Att Du Har**
* Erfarenhet av att leda mjukvaruteam med ansvar för leverans och medarbetare.
* Erfarenhet av att bygga plattformar samt en passion för developer experience, DevOps och att göra komplexa saker enkla för utvecklare.
* Djup och bred kompetens inom Azure, Kubernetes och Infrastructure as Code med Terraform eller Bicep.
* Tidigare hands-on-erfarenhet som utvecklare, gärna inom Java, Go eller TypeScript.
* Erfarenhet av Backstage eller liknande developer portal-lösningar.
* Förmågan att översätta strategi till tydliga prioriteringar och skapa fokus i komplexa miljöer.
* Ett empatiskt och tydligt ledarskap som skapar trygghet, ansvarstagande och hög prestation.
* Erfarenhet av personalansvar och budgetarbete.
* Akademisk utbildning på högskola/universitet eller motsvarande erfarenhet.


**Ansökan och information** 
  

  

 Urval sker löpande så skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt.
   

  

 Om SJ AB
   

  

 SJ är ett svenskt reseföretag som erbjuder hållbara tågresor i egen regi och i samarbete med andra. SJ är ett av Sveriges grönaste varumärken och en del av lösningen för att klimatmålen ska nås. Koncernens drygt 6 600 medarbetare i Sverige och Norge bidrar alla till ökat tågresande – SJ för Sverige framåt.
   

  

**Grundades** 
 1856
   

  

**Medarbetare** 
 6600
   

  

**Omsättning** 
 10 600 msek
   

  

 Sök jobbet här

title: Principal Engineer
description:
**What You Will Do** 




 You will drive Klarna’s technical direction within and across Klarnas domains - ensuring that our systems are scalable, resilient, and architected for long-term growth. You’ll shape architectural strategy, connect cross-functional initiatives, and elevate Klarna’s engineering standards across the organization.
 







 ● Lead cross-domain engineering strategy and execution - translating Klarna’s vision into scalable, secure, and efficient architectures that serve multiple business areas, while fostering technical alignment across teams and competences.
 



 ● Architect and evolve Klarna’s technical foundations by simplifying systems, reducing duplication, and driving consistency in data models, APIs, and integration patterns that power global customer and merchant experiences.
 



 ● Set and uphold Klarna-wide technical standards for code quality, observability, reliability, and data management - ensuring operational excellence and enabling teams to deliver confidently at scale.
 



 ● Partner with Product, Data Science, and Design leaders to align technical investments with business outcomes, balancing long-term architectural evolution with short-term delivery priorities.
 



 ● Mentor and grow Klarna’s senior technical community, guiding Lead and Principal Engineers in decision-making, design reviews, and career development, while nurturing a culture of technical curiosity and shared accountability.
 



 ● Drive innovation and continuous improvement by exploring emerging technologies, improving developer experience, and enabling Klarna’s platforms to adapt to future opportunities and challenges.
   





**Who You Are** 




 ● A recognized technical leader with deep experience delivering and scaling distributed systems across multiple business or product domains.
 



 ● Strategic in thinking yet pragmatic in execution — able to balance innovation, speed, and stability across complex organizations.
 



 ● Skilled in system architecture, data integration, and building reliable, observable systems that enable high-velocity teams.
 



 ● Adept at influencing across teams and functions, aligning diverse stakeholders behind clear technical direction.
 



 ● A committed mentor who builds inclusive, empowered teams and fosters technical growth across the organization.
 



 ● Curious, reflective, and driven by continuous improvement - both personal and organizational.
   





**Awesome to Have** 




 ● Experience leading cross-functional initiatives in payments, e-commerce, or large-scale technology platforms.
 



 ● Expertise in distributed architecture, event-driven systems, and cloud-native technologies (AWS, Kubernetes, Kafka).
 



 ● Proven success improving observability, reliability, or developer productivity at company scale.
 



 ● A track record of translating technical strategy into measurable business impact across domains.

title: ServiceNow Developer
description:
**\*\*\* ServiceNow Developer - 6 months + ext. - Hybrid / Stockholm \*\*\*** 




  





 RED now has a new opportunity for a ServiceNow Developer to join one of our key partners on an initial 6 months contract with long-term prospects.
 



  





 This role is to start ASAP and will be Hybrid with around 50% on-site in Stockholm and 50% remote.
 



  





**Specific skills/experience required:** 



* 5+ years of hands-on experience with ServiceNow CMDB and CSDM (v3.0 or later).
* Strong skills in JavaScript, Glide API, and ServiceNow configuration.
* Solid understanding of ITIL v4 and ServiceNow platform architecture.
* Experience in data modelling, CI class design, and CMDB health improvements.
* Excellent communication and documentation skills ,able to explain complex models in simple terms
* ServiceNow certifications (CIS–CMDB, CIS–Discovery, CSA) preferred.



  





**Candidates HAS to be based in Sweden.** 




  





 If you are interested please contact Alex Upton-Agerholm on aagerholm@redglobal.com or apply here.

title: Senior Utvecklare/Tech Lead
description:
På Sogeti tror vi att det bästa finns inom oss alla. Oavsett om du är i början av din karriär eller redan på toppen av ditt spel, kommer vi att uppmuntra dig att nå din fulla potential och bli bättre. Genom vår gemensamma passion för teknik, vår entreprenöriella kultur och vårt fokus på kontinuerligt lärande, kommer vi att ge dig allt du behöver för att göra ditt bästa arbete och bli den bästa versionen av dig själv.
   

  

**Senior Utvecklare\Tech Lead**
**Om rollen**
 Är du en erfaren utvecklare med en passion för arkitektur och lösningsdesign? Vill du ta nästa steg i din karriär och bli en nyckelspelare i att forma framtidens tekniska lösningar? Då är detta möjligheten för dig! Vi erbjuder spännande, varierande och trygga uppdrag inom samhällets viktigaste områden.  Sogeti Stockholm satsar stort på att expandera inom flera IT-kompetenser. Vi har fått förtroendet från en av våra stora kunder inom offentlig sektor som deras långsiktiga strategiska partner.  Det innebär otaliga spännande möjligheter för dig som vill vara en del av Sogetis framgång!
   

  

*I den här rollen kommer du att ha en nyckelroll i:*
* Design och implementering av robusta, skalbara och tekniska lösningar.
* Arbete nära utvecklingsteam och andra intressenter för att säkerställa att tekniska lösningar möter behoven.
* Förståelse och omvandling av verksamhetens mål och utmaningar till krav för att skapa värdeskapande lösningar.


**Din profil**
* Högskole/universitetsutbildning om minst 180hp inom systemvetenskap, IT eller ingenjörsutbildning.
* Har minst 5 års erfarenhet av att arbeta med arkitekturfrågor och lösningsdesign i rollen som utvecklare, lead engineer/developer, tech lead, lösningsarkitekt eller liknande.
* Är metodiskt driven, har vana att arbeta systematiskt och tycker om att lära sig ny teknologi.
* En förmåga att se till kundens helhetsbild och drivs av att vara organiserad och planerad i komplexa miljöer.
* En mycket god kommunikationsförmåga samt mycket god förmåga att uttrycka dig på svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.


**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas**
 Innovativ miljö: Hos oss får du chansen att jobba med den senaste tekniken och vara en del av ett dynamiskt team som älskar att skapa värde genom innovation.
   

  

 Karriärutveckling: Vi bryr oss om din framtid och erbjuder utvecklingsprogram och certifieringar i de senaste teknologierna, så att du kan växa och bli den bästa versionen av dig själv.
   

  

 Flexibelt arbete: Vi förstår att livet är mer än bara jobb. Därför erbjuder vi möjligheter till distansarbete och flexibla arbetstider för att du ska må bra och trivas.
   

  

 Teamkänsla: Vi är som en stor familj med en härlig teamkänsla. Genom att leva efter våra värdeord som mod, passion, laganda och entreprenörskap - skapar vi en arbetsmiljö där alla kan trivas.
   

  

**Ansökan**
*Vi välkomnar varmt din ansökan idag, urvalet sker löpande! Om du har frågor om tjänsten eller rekryteringsprocessen, vänligen kontakta Team Manager, Simon Karlsson på simon.karlsson@sogeti.se*
*Som en del av vår rekryteringsprocess kommer identitetskontroll att genomföras genom granskning av ditt ID-kort, och bakgrundskontroller kan utföras vid behov.*
 Sogeti Sverige, en del av Capgemini-koncernen, med 21 kontor och 1300 medarbetare, skapar affärsvärde med teknologi för organisationer som behöver införa innovation snabbt och som vill ha en lokal partner med global skalbarhet. Med en hands-on-kultur och närhet till kunderna, implementerar Sogeti lösningar som hjälper organisationer att arbeta snabbare, bättre och smartare. Genom att kombinera agilitet och snabb implementation via en DevOps-ansats, levererar Sogeti innovativa lösningar inom test- och kvalitetssäkring, molnet och systemutveckling, förstärkta av AI, data och automation.

title: Senior Backend Engineer, Personalisation
description:
**About Wolt**
 At Wolt, we create technology that brings joy, simplicity and earnings to the neighborhoods of the world. In 2014 we started with delivery of restaurant food. Now we’re building the delivery of (almost) everything and you’ll find us in over 500 cities in 30 countries around the world. In 2022 we joined forces with DoorDash and together we keep on dreaming big and expanding across the globe.
   

  

 Working at Wolt isn’t always easy, but it’s definitely exciting. Here you’ll learn more, build more, and ship more than in most other companies. You’ll be challenged a lot, but also have a lot of fun on the way. So, if you’re a self-starter with drive and entrepreneurial spirit, this could be the ride of your life.
   

  

 Wolt’s
 **Personalization team** 
 is responsible for creating a tailored experience for Wolt’s customers across their shopping journey, helping them to discover the best restaurants, dishes or items that match their culinary and shopping preferences across multiple premises such as Discovery, In Venue or Checkout.
   

  

 We build and maintain the
 **recommendation systems** 
 that power these experiences in real time for millions of users across more than 30 markets. For example, the team is responsible for the models that rank restaurants in Wolt’s Discovery page, venues in Wolt’s category pages or items in Wolt’s in-venue and cart premises. It also personalises other components in Wolt’s shopping experience such as brands, banners or food categories that are relevant entry points for our customers to explore Wolt’s assortment.
   

  

 The team is multidisciplinary, including software engineers, applied scientists, ML Engineers. Together, we own the
 **ML-powered personalisation stack** 
 , integrations across Wolt’s platform, and the systems that turn customer behavior and data into meaningful, dynamic and engaging experiences.
   

  

 What you’ll be doing
   

  

 As a
 **Software Engineer** 
 in Wolt’s Personalisation team, you will:
   

  

* Design, build, and scale backend systems and APIs that deliver personalised experiences to millions of customers every day.
* Work closely with ML Engineers and Applied Scientists to integrate models into robust, high-performance services.
* Improve reliability and performance of the real-time recommendation stack, ensuring low-latency responses under high traffic.
* Contribute to the team’s technical architecture, driving improvements in scalability, observability, and developer experience.
* Champion code quality and engineering best practices and mentor junior team colleagues.
* Take ownership of the end-to-end software lifecycle — from design to deployment and monitoring — of the services you build.


 Our humble expectations
   

  

 Solid experience in
 **backend software development** 
 (the team uses Python & Go).A strong understanding of
 **distributed systems** 
 ,
 **microservice architectures** 
 , and
 **API design** 
 .Experience building
 **high-performance services** 
 — ideally at scale, with thousands of RPS and strict latency budgets.Familiarity with
 **containerisation and orchestration** 
 (Docker, Kubernetes) and
 **cloud-native development** 
 (AWS, GCP, or similar).Experience integrating with or supporting
 **ML or data-driven systems** 
 in production is a plus.Good understanding of
 **observability, monitoring** 
 , and debugging distributed systems.Experience collaborating in
 **cross-functional product teams** 
 , balancing technical quality with user impact.Strong communication and collaboration skills — you enjoy mentoring, pairing, and sharing knowledge.
   

  

 What we offer
   

  

* The opportunity to shape Wolt’s personalisation systems, serving millions of customers daily.
* Be involved in rolling out new AI products for solving real customer problems with a measurable business impact.
* Work in a cross-disciplinary environment with ML Engineers, Applied Scientists, Data Scientists, Designers and Product Leads who share your passion for building great customer-facing products.
* A culture of ownership and excellence — you’ll take projects from conception to production and see the impact on users quickly at Woltwide.
* Have a tangible and measured impact on Wolt’s business KPIs and Wolt's customers’ experience.


 Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion
   

  

 We’re committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company, industry, and cities. That’s why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of people from all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We believe that true innovation happens when everyone has room at the table and the tools, resources, and opportunity to excel.

title: Senior Android Developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* Experienced Android engineer (5–8 years) with a proven record of shipping high-quality, user-facing apps.
* Expert in Kotlin, with strong understanding of Jetpack Compose, Coroutines, and modern Android architecture (MVVM, Clean Architecture, modularization).
* Comfortable working with Jetpack libraries, Material Design, and the latest Android SDKs.
* Passionate about code quality, testing, and maintainability.
* Experienced with unit, UI, and integration testing (JUnit, Espresso, MockK).
* Familiar with CI/CD systems (Gradle, GitHub Actions, Codemagic, Firebase App Distribution).
* Proactive, curious, and eager to adopt new tools and best practices.
* Collaborative communicator who values teamwork, feedback, and shared success.


**Meritorious**
* experience with Firebase, Maps/Location APIs, or Store integration


**Application deadline:** 
 17-11-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Experienced Backend Developer - Tracking Information Team, Solna
description:
*Are you ready to make an impact on millions of lives every day? Join us at PostNord, where your work will help shape the future of logistics across the Nordics!*
*In our team, we build and run the central event manager - the engine that handles millions of events every day. What we do is at the heart of PostNord’s digital ecosystem, enabling everything from parcel tracking to future innovations. We care deeply about quality, ownership, and making life easier for our users - whether they’re customers, colleagues, or developers in other teams. You’ll join a group of curious, collaborative people who enjoy solving real problems together.*
**Be part of the Tracking Information Team**
* We deliver services that impact millions of customers and recipients in the Nordics daily, ensuring they are accessible through platforms like our website and the PostNord app.
* You’ll help build backend solutions that keep things running smoothly for millions of people — making deliveries more reliable and everyday life a little easier, one package at a time. We care about quality and user experience, and you’ll play a key role in making sure our systems live up to that.
* We develop microservices in Kubernetes.
* Our infrastructure is hosted on AWS.
* We prioritize quality and robustness in our deliveries, as they directly affect our customers.
* We take full ownership of our services—from design and development to security, monitoring, and business metrics. With DevOps, we ensure quality at every step.
* We deploy multiple times a week, seeing the value of our work immediately.
* Our team takes responsibility for optimizing our work processes, using practices like mob and pair programming to enhance collaboration, quality, and collective knowledge.
* We collaborate closely with IT teams at PostNord, as well as production units, management, customers, and partners, to capture requirements and ensure our deliveries meet expectations. We’re passionate about what we do, and we want you to join us in shaping the future of logistics!


 ,
   

  

**Who are you?**
 You're a developer with a solid foundation — whether that comes from formal studies or hands-on experience - and you're always looking to grow. You like solving real and complex problems, working in agile teams, and building things that actually help people.
   

  

* You’re into backend development and curious about building robust systems with a great user experience.
* You’re interested in cloud technologies (like AWS) and Java is one of your go-to languages — or one you’re excited to learn more about.
* You take ownership of what you build — from first commit to production and beyond.
* You’re driven by making everyday life simpler for customers, colleagues, and users.


 You’re someone who communicates clearly and openly — whether it’s in code reviews, standups, or just helping a teammate out.
   

  

**Valuable Skills And Experience**
**AWS:** 
 Sound/Basic experience with AWS components such as DynamoDB, Lambda, S3 bucket and CDK/Cloudformation. SQS/Kinesis will be bonus.
   

  

**What we value:** 
 Hands-on experience is great, but a willingness to learn and build serverless solutions is just as important.
   

  

**Java:** 
 We work with Java 21/SE+ and Spring Boot, and we emphasize writing stable, well-tested code.
   

  

**What we value:** 
 Basic knowledge is essential, and we’ll support you in deepening your expertise. Good understanding of Java 21+ and Spring Boot for developing backend applications. I am eager to learn and grow skills for developing cloud native applications using AWS.
   

  

 Kafka (or real data streaming tools) will be bonus
   

  

**Github/Docker and (AWS EKS):** 
 These tools help us scale and orchestrate our applications.
   

  

**What we value:** 
 Some familiarity is helpful, but not required—we’ll help you get up to speed.
   

  

 Basic knowledge will suffice from the task completion via code development till production deployment
   

  

**REST API Services And OpenAPI Documentation (aka Swagger)**
 We use REST APIs and Swagger for defining and documenting secure web services.
   

  

**What we value:** 
 If you’ve worked with APIs before, great! If not, we’ll guide you through it.
   

  

**Prometheus And Grafana**
 Monitoring and visualization tools that help us ensure performance and reliability.
   

  

**What we value** 
 : No prior experience needed—we’ll provide on-the-job training.
   

  

 Knowledge of prometheus/grafana will be bonus
   

  

 You’ve probably studied something like Computer Science or Information Systems — or maybe you’ve picked up your skills in other ways. What matters most is that you know your stuff. You’re comfortable communicating in both Swedish and English, whether it’s in writing or in conversation.
   

  

**What We Offer**
* Step into a dynamic hybrid workplace where collaboration, creativity, and innovation are at the heart of everything we do.
* Grow with us! We support your development with opportunities for career advancement—including sponsorship for AWS certifications.
* Feel secure with comprehensive insurance and pension plans that have you covered.
* Stay healthy and energized with a wellness allowance to Arkens gym and pool.
* Enjoy exclusive perks through PostNord Plus, giving you access to a wide range of employee benefits.


**Making everyday life easier**
 PostNord is the leading provider of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordics. We ensure postal services for individuals and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. Our goal is to make everyday life simpler and more sustainable for everyone in the Nordics.
   

  

 We are accountable, courageous, and committed, effectively leading change for ourselves and others. We value teamwork, honesty, and positive relationships in the workplace. By embracing diversity, we create better outcomes for the business.
   

  

**Apply Now**
 What are you waiting for? Take the next step in your career and join us in creating extraordinary solutions for millions across the Nordics! Selections and interviews are conducted on an ongoing basis, so apply as soon as possible. If you have any questions about the position, feel free to email robert.svensson-eshraghi@postnord.com

title: Senior BI Developer
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Du har djup erfarenhet av Microsoft Power Platform (Power BI, Power Apps, Power Automate).
* Du har gedigen kunskap i SharePoint Online, inklusive listor, bibliotek och moderna gränssnitt.
* Du har erfarenhet av Dataverse och datahantering i molnbaserade miljöer.
* Du har förståelse för programmeringsspråk såsom C#, .NET, JavaScript, HTML5 och CSS.
* Du har vana vid versionshantering och utvecklingsverktyg (Azure DevOps, Git).
* Du har stark analytisk och problemlösande förmåga, samt god kommunikationsförmåga.
* Du har relevant akademisk examen, Power Platform-certifieringar är meriterande.


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 14-11-2025
   

  

**Om Oss**
 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.
   

  

 Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.
